1628510.name: Net VR Theater
1628510.description:
Step into the future of entertainment with TheNetVR!
A first-of-its-kind virtual streaming platform. Gather your community in a 3D cinema for the start of an unforgettable social experience.

Experience An Immersive Theater Like No Other
- Spatial audio for immersive chat that surrounds you
- Customizable theater settings to craft the perfect atmosphere
- Seamless streaming through an OBS of your choice into the theater
- Level up and customize your 3D avatars through an engaging progression system
- Dedicated hosting controls to run your own showtimes
- Integrated streaming service API for real-time chat and video
- VR support to fully immerse yourself (with more VR features on the way!)

More features to come; as we are in the Alpha phase, we are looking for more testers and ideas!
